decision_text:
Patient: age 72, primary: Right Chest pain, history of diabetes and hypertension.
Actionable summary:
- Encourage oral hydration for outpatients; consider point-of-care creatinine if no recent result.
- Consider alternative non-contrast imaging if diagnostically adequate.
- Document discussion of renal risk and obtain consent when practicable; monitor creatinine post-contrast if indicated.
rationale: eGFR 59 — moderate renal risk; consider hydration/minimize contrast.
